name: Tiramisu
Bahan:
200 gram whipped cream bubuk
2 sdm coffemix (campuran kopi, gula, dan susu)
300 ml air es
250 gram cream cheese
50 gram coklat bubuk
sponge cake secukupnya
description: Sigh. Tiramisu. The first time I tried it was back when I lived in L.A., and it happened to also be the first time I trie...

ingredients:
Crust
¾ cups unbleached all-purpose flour
2 tablespoons natural cane sugar
½ teaspoon salt
½ stick butter
2 ounces cream cheese
2 tablespoons- ¼ cup cold water
Filling:
5-6 Large apple
½ cup natural sugar
½ cup sucanat
½ cup flour
1 tablespoon water
1 tablespoon cinnamon
1 teaspoon nutmeg
Topping:
½ cup sugar
½ cup unbleached all-purpose flour
¼ cup butter, softened.
name: Apple Pie
Waffle
Bahan:
250 gram tepung terigu
1 1/2 sdt baking powder
3 sdm gula pasir
30 gram mentega tawar
375 ml susu
2 butir telur
1/2 sdt garam
description: Start Christmas day with this Scandinavian breakfast – it’s so simple and it will wow your guests.
